lead_paragraph: Turkish police struggled Monday to track down a gunman who attacked New Year's Eve revelers at a popular Istanbul nightclub, killing at least 39 people, most of them foreigners. Close to 70 more were wounded.
snippet: Turkish police struggled Monday to track down a gunman who attacked New Year's Eve revelers at a popular Istanbul nightclub, killing at least 39 people, most of them foreigners. Close to 70 more were wounded....

headline.main: Police Struggle in Hunt for Gunman in Istanbul Slayings
headline.print_headline: Police Struggle in Hunt for Gunman in Istanbul Slayings
